scenario.name: INVITE to echo with SDP in initial INVITE
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:s@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: alice <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: s <sip:s@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Test User-Agent: Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=phoneA 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 6000 RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:s@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: alice <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: s <sip:s@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Test Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, INFO, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PRACK, UPDATE, REFER Supported: 100rel,replaces User-Agent: Test Accept-Language: en Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, INFO, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PRACK, UPDATE, REFER Supported: 100rel,replaces User-Agent: Test Accept-Language: en Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: 0
